section.title: File Locations
section.entry: The location of your MP3 files.

Choose between mpg123 or mpg321. Enter the full path if it is not on your $PATH. You may need to add options here to support your sound system. (e.g. mpg321 -o esd for gnome esound support. Or mpg123 -a /dev/sound/dsp for devfs support)
